ygData.subject: Re: Which spells to use?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes many Illusion spells are erudin only.  The spell list I have at eq.castersrealm.com gives fairly general locations for people. Baels ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Yes many Illusion spells are erudin only. The spell list I have at
eq.castersrealm.com gives fairly general locations for people.

Baels
----- Original Message -----
From: <EQCariel@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 29, 1999 4:30 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Which spells to use?


> From: EQCariel@...
>
> In a message dated 8/6/99 8:25:33 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
> nosferatu@... writes:
>
> << All spells except the following are available from all enchanter
> vendors: level 8+ animations, enchant metal spells, certain spells above
> level 16, as these are research only (some are available from other
> guilds (levite, disempower,etc..)
> > >>
>
> Aren't many of the illusions also available only in certain places?
>
